Package algorithms.paths

Class DP_Quick

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.paths.DP_Iterator
      • algorithms.paths.DP_Anyk_Iterator
        • algorithms.paths.DP_Part
          • algorithms.paths.DP_Quick
  • public class DP_Quick
extends DP_Part
    Quick is a variant of Anyk-Part that implements get_successors(entities.paths.DP_Decision) by incrementally sorting the decision set with Incremental QuickSort (IQS). Each call returns the single true successor like DP_Eager and DP_Lazy. IQS is proposed in Paredes and Navarro 2006 https://doi/10.1137/1.9781611972863.16. It works by tweaking the usual quicksort method so that it returns the sorted result incrementally with a very small overhead.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

      • get_successors

        public List<DP_Decision> get_successors​(DP_Decision dec)
        Description copied from class: DP_Part
        Find the successors of a given decision among the other decisions in the DP_DecisionSet. The way that successors are computed depends on the variant (subclass).
        Specified by:
        get_successors in class DP_Part
        Parameters:
        dec - The decision whose successors will be computed.
        Returns:
